hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "hello world" curl -v -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"Image": "slave"}' http://172.17.0.1:2376/containers/create?name=slave-test curl -v -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" http://172.17.0.1:2376/containers/slave-test/start curl -v -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" http://172.17.0.1:2376/containers/slave-test/stop curl -v -X DELETE -H "Content-Type: application/json" http://172.17.0.1:2376/containers/slave-test
